tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE insured_vehicles (
  make VARCHAR,
  model VARCHAR,
  year INT,
  vin_number VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE policy_administration (
  policy_id INT,
  policy_holder VARCHAR,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE verification (
  verification_id INT,
  vehicle_id INT,
  policy_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE insured_vehicles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    year INT,
    vin_number VARCHAR(17)
);

CREATE TABLE insured_vehicles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(255),
    model VARCHAR(255),
    year INT,
    vin_number VARCHAR(17)
)

CREATE TABLE policy (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    policy_number VARCHAR(12)
)

CREATE TABLE claim (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE policy_holder (
    holder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE insurance_company (
    company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255)
)
